name: For a Fistful of Bullets
description:
move - WSAD

aim - right mouse button

charge melee / boomerang - left mouse button

change weapon - scroll wheel

The current build has few bugs which are already fixed, but the fixed version will be uploaded after the voting period is over.

Wojtaj - programming, level design, game design

Lonnie - 3D art, music, sound design, game design

All assets except fonts and sfx are our own.
